name: TEQUILA!
description:
This game is very silly! It uses voice recognition, and all you have to do is say "Tequila" in time with the music! The music will get faster and the window to say "Tequila" will get shorter, so be prepared!

Note: This game only works on windows computers currently. It downloads as a Unity project, the build is currently not working. 3/1/2020
